# SparkForge Visual Learning Guide

Visual diagrams and flowcharts to help you understand SparkForge concepts and make better decisions.

## ğŸ¯ Decision Tree: Execution Mode

```
What type of processing do you need?
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Full Refresh
â”‚  â”œâ”€ All data processed every time
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Use: pipeline.initial_load()
â”‚  â””â”€ Best for: Reference data, small datasets
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Incremental Processing
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Only new/changed data processed
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Bronze has datetime column?
â”‚  â”‚  â”œâ”€ Yes â†’ Use: pipeline.run_incremental()
â”‚  â”‚  â””â”€ No â†’ Use: pipeline.run_incremental() (Silver overwrite)
â”‚  â””â”€ Best for: Large datasets, real-time processing
â”‚
â””â”€ Validation Only
   â”œâ”€ Check data quality without writing
   â”œâ”€ Use: pipeline.run_validation_only()
   â””â”€ Best for: Testing, data quality checks
```

## ğŸ”§ Decision Tree: Validation Thresholds

```
What's your data quality requirement?
â”‚
â”œâ”€ High Quality (99%+)
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Bronze: 98%+
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Silver: 99%+
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Gold: 99.5%+
â”‚  â””â”€ Best for: Financial data, critical systems
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Medium Quality (95-98%)
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Bronze: 95%
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Silver: 98%
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Gold: 99%
â”‚  â””â”€ Best for: Business analytics, reporting
â”‚
â””â”€ Standard Quality (90-95%)
   â”œâ”€ Bronze: 90%
   â”œâ”€ Silver: 95%
   â”œâ”€ Gold: 98%
   â””â”€ Best for: Experimental data, prototypes
```

## ğŸš€ Performance Optimization Decision Tree

```
What's your performance bottleneck?
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Data Volume (Large datasets)
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Enable parallel execution: True
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Max parallel workers: 8+
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Consider unified execution
â”‚  â””â”€ Use incremental processing
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Processing Complexity (Complex transforms)
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Optimize individual steps
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Use step-by-step debugging
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Profile performance
â”‚  â””â”€ Break down complex transformations
â”‚
â””â”€ Resource Constraints (Limited compute)
   â”œâ”€ Reduce parallel workers: 2-4
   â”œâ”€ Use incremental processing
   â”œâ”€ Optimize validation rules
   â””â”€ Consider cloud scaling
```

## ğŸ” Step-by-Step Debugging Flow

```
Pipeline Execution Failed âŒ
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Check Overall Results
â”‚  â”œâ”€ result.success = False
â”‚  â”œâ”€ result.error_message
â”‚  â””â”€ result.failed_steps
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Debug Bronze Layer
â”‚  â”œâ”€ bronze_result = pipeline.execute_bronze_step("events", input_data=df)
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Check validation_rate
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Inspect validation_errors
â”‚  â””â”€ Fix data quality issues
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Debug Silver Layer
â”‚  â”œâ”€ silver_result = pipeline.execute_silver_step("clean_events")
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Check output_count
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Inspect transformation logic
â”‚  â””â”€ Fix transformation issues
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Debug Gold Layer
â”‚  â”œâ”€ gold_result = pipeline.execute_gold_step("analytics")
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Check aggregation logic
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Inspect source data
â”‚  â””â”€ Fix analytics issues
â”‚
â””â”€ Re-run Pipeline
    â”œâ”€ Fix identified issues
    â”œâ”€ Re-run individual steps
    â””â”€ Execute complete pipeline
```

## ğŸ¢ Use Case Architecture Diagrams

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
```

```
â”‚ Business BI     â”‚ 95-98%      â”‚ Full Refreshâ”‚ 4-6         â”‚ Enterprise  â”‚

â”‚ Experimental    â”‚ 90-95%      â”‚ Validation  â”‚ 1-2         â”‚ Basic       â”‚
â”‚ Prototype       â”‚ 90-95%      â”‚ Full Refreshâ”‚ 1-2         â”‚ Basic       â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

## ğŸ”§ Troubleshooting Flowchart

```
Pipeline Execution Failed
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Check Spark Session
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Is Spark running? â†’ Start Spark session
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Java installed? â†’ Install Java 8+
â”‚  â””â”€ Memory sufficient? â†’ Increase driver memory
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Check Data Sources
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Data accessible? â†’ Check file paths/permissions
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Data format correct? â†’ Validate schema
â”‚  â””â”€ Data quality issues? â†’ Clean source data
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Check Pipeline Configuration
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Validation thresholds too high? â†’ Lower thresholds
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Parallel workers too many? â†’ Reduce workers
â”‚  â””â”€ Schema conflicts? â†’ Fix schema issues
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Check Transformations
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Syntax errors? â†’ Fix code syntax
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Logic errors? â†’ Debug transformation logic
â”‚  â””â”€ Performance issues? â†’ Optimize transformations
â”‚
â””â”€ Check Resources
    â”œâ”€ Memory exhausted? â†’ Increase memory/optimize
    â”œâ”€ CPU overloaded? â†’ Reduce parallel workers
    â””â”€ Disk space full? â†’ Clean up temporary files
```
